class.name: VisualShaderNodeTransformVectorMultiply
class.brief_description: Multiplies a [Transform3D] and a [Vector4] within the visual shader graph.
class.description: A multiplication operation on a transform (4Ã—4 matrix) and a vector, with support for different multiplication operators. See also [VisualShaderNodeVectorCoordinateTransform].

members.member: The multiplication type to be performed. See [enum Operator] for options.

constants.constant: Represents the size of the [enum Operator] enum.
